entry.title: Linux(opensuse) 下的 ISO 挂载
entry.content:
加载部分

首先创建个新目录

sudo mkdir /mnt/iso

然后尝试加载

sudo mount -o XX.iso /mnt/iso

然后会提示

mount: can't find /mnt/iso in /etc/fstab

别看表面意思,原来是没有指定iso格式,那怎么查看呢

file XX.iso

然后如果是 iso966 那么执行

sudo mount -o loop -t iso9660 xx.iso /mnt

如果是 udf 的光盘映像

sudo mount -o loop -t udf xx.iso /mnt

卸载部分

sudo umount /mnt/iso

entry.title: 新博客
entry.content:
mvn op:new-post -Dtitle="世界，你好" -Dname="hello-world"
fatal: You are on a branch yet to be born

Create a new repository on the command line

touch README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git remote add origin git@github.com:VilenEera/test.git
git push -u origin master

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Welcome to OpooPress. This is your first post.

Edit or delete it, then start blogging!
